observation: Hodgson Sealants - High Quality Premium Sealants  Powered by Cookiebot Consent Details [#IABV2SETTINGS#] About This website uses cookies We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. Consent Selection Necessary Preferences Statistics Marketing Show details 6 Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies. Cloudflare 1 Learn more about this provider mirage_cache_manifest This cookie is necessary for the cache function. A cache is used by the website to optimize the response time between the visitor and the website. The cache is usually stored on the visitor’s browser. Expiry Type Cookiebot 2 CookieConsent Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain 1.gif Used to count the number of sessions to the website, necessary for optimizing CMP product delivery. freestyle.digital __cf_bm [x2] This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website. hodgsonsealants.com wpEmojiSettingsSupports This cookie is part of a bundle of cookies which serve the purpose of content delivery and presentation. The cookies keep the correct state of font, blog/picture sliders, color themes and other website settings. 0 Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in. We do not use cookies of this type. 7 Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously. Google _ga Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website. _ga_# Used by Google Analytics to collect data on the number of times a user has visited the website as well as dates for the first and most recent visit. Issuu __qca Collects data on the user's visits to the website, such as the number of visits, average time spent on the website and what pages have been loaded with the purpose of generating reports for optimising the website content. qcSes Quantcast 3 _dlt [x2] Sets a unique ID for the session. This allows the website to obtain data on visitor behaviour for statistical purposes. Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers. iutk Recognises the user's device and what Issuu documents have been read. mc Collects data on the user's visits to the website, such as what pages have been loaded. The registered data is used for targeted ads. Unclassified Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies. Cross-domain consent [#BULK_CONSENT_DOMAINS_COUNT#] List of domains your consent applies to: Cookie declaration last updated on 3/23/24 by [#IABV2_TITLE#] [#IABV2_BODY_LEGITIMATE_INTEREST_INTRO#] [#IABV2_BODY_PREFERENCE_INTRO#] [#IABV2_LABEL_PURPOSES#] [#IABV2_BODY_PURPOSES_INTRO#] [#IABV2_BODY_FEATURES#] Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient. Do not sell or share my personal information Deny Allow selection Customize Powered by Cookiebot by Usercentrics Home Construction Industry Fire Products Technical News Contact Shop Online Glass & Glazing Window & Door Installation Commercial Glazing HVAC Roofing & Cladding Modular Building Caravan & Holiday Homes Vehicle Assembly Silfix® Silicone Sealants Acrylic Sealants HY-SPEC® Hybrid Sealants Mastic Sealants Fire Protection Putty & Glazing Tapes PU Foam Tools & Consumables Customer Own Label UK’s Leading Sealant At Hodgson is Our Range Brochure Our full range of putties, silicones, acrylic sealants and butyl glazing tapes are used for a wide variety of glazing and joinery applications. Glazing Applications Our range of silicone sealants is available in a variety of colours, sizes and packaging types Window & Door Applications For making roofs, facades and building envelopes safe, weather-poof and secure Commercial Glazing Applications Sealing and bonding in HVAC applications can produce special challenges. Our thorough understanding of the market and its requirements has led to the development of a solid range of highly flexible, durable, and strong sealing solutions. HVAC Applications Because our products create such excellent, flexible, long-lasting seals with predictable movement characteristics, they have many uses in sealing and weatherproofing roofing and cladding projects. Roofing & Cladding Applications Modular Building Applications Nowhere is a strong, failsafe, weatherproof seal more important than in leisure vehicle production: motor homes, holiday homes, park homes, and touring and static caravans. Our range of sealants and tapes have been tested on all of the industry’s common substrates over many years with solutions to streamline and speed up production at every stage of the process. Caravan Applications Structurally formed to withstand the stringent requirements of the vehicle production and converting sectors, used in a wide variety of sealing and bonding tasks in the production and assembly process. Vehicle Assembly Applications Passive Fire Protection Our sealants will form an airtight seal which can halt the spread of fire and smoke through joints and seals in walls, floors, and doors. Designed to resist the spread of toxic gases and fire, and accredited to all British, European, and international standards, our products are used in the glazing of doors and screens, joints in firewalls, fire rated ductwork, architraves, and service penetrations. Fire Protection Applications Global Butyl specialist sister Browse 01482 868321 Sales enquiries: technicalservices@hodgsonsealants.com Belprin Road, Beverley, East Yorkshire, HU17 0LN, United Kingdom Navigation Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Silfix® Silicone Acrylic HY-SPEC® Hybrid Mastic Protection Putty Glazing PU Foam Tools Consumables Own Label © Hodgson Sealants Website by Freestyle Shop Online
